intro: Aganosma cymosa var. glabra, commonly known as the smooth aganosma, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its smooth, glabrous stems and leaves that are typically elliptical in shape. It produces small, clustered white flowers that bloom in the summer months. The plant is often grown as an ornamental due to its attractive foliage and compact growth habit.
